com.beaglebuddy.ape

Class APEHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.ape.APEFooter
      • com.beaglebuddy.ape.APEHeader

  • public class APEHeader
extends APEFooter

    This class provides methods for reading the APE header in an APE tag. The APE tag header is only found in APEv2 tags, and allows an APEv2 tag to be located at the beginning of an .mp3 file instead of the end. It is 32 bytes long.

    See Also:
    APEv1 Specification, APEv2 Specification
